page.title: 10GREAT MEOLS:CLUBS,SOCIETIES.
page.content: {1st Great Meols Guides:}Started 1940, present leader(Akela)-Mrs.Dutton, who has been a Guide since the age of 7. The uniform consists of a blue skirt, blue shirt,red kerchief+{woggle}and a blue hat.The pack is organised into patrols.In the Meols Guides the patrols are named after flowers, eg. Poppy and White Heather.The Guides are associated with{St.John's Church}where the girls attend Church Parade each Sunday. The children enjoy a variety of events such as camping, with sing-songs around the campfire, swimming galas, jumble sales and Challenge Awards for Guide badges. A typical session lasts 2 hours and ends with{"TAPS"-a song-"Day is done, {Gone the sun,From the sea, From the {hills,From the sky. All is well,Safely {rest, God is nigh."
